bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments
Multi-Channel Operation
IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments - Multi-Channel Operation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Multi-channel wireless radio operations, Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) mode, medium access control (MAC), and physical layers (PHYs), including the operation of control channel (CCH) and service channel (SCH) interval timers, parameters for priority access, channel switching and routing, management services, and primitives designed for multi-channel operations are described in this standard.
